task.summary: Default task
- keyboard set to visible upon start of the application - fixed calculating original price when discount percentage is one hundred
- fixed calculating original price when discount percentage is one hundred
- reworked radio buttons as a spinner on DiscountCalculatorFragmen
- commented out the navigation spinner for the main activity
- tweaked values identifiers for price_before_after

- added layout file for spinner items
TODO: - tried to put in a code to deactivate the soft keyboard upon creating SavedDiscountsFragment, but it doesn't work - TODO: find out why
- resolved keyboard hiding on SavedDiscountsFragment - tweaks in layout
- changed SpinnerAdapter to DiscountBeforeAfterAdapter in DiscountCalculatorFragment - tweaks in layout
- converted methods in CurrencyProvider to static (it's more logical since there's no need for instantiating the class) - minor layout tweaks for fragment_discount_calculator
- minor change in DiscountItem class to correctly handle savings amount when price before is set to 0 and discount amount to 100% (before it yielded incorrect result of N/A when should have been 0)
- fixed minor rounding problem in DisCalc class

- tweaks in computing priceBefore (when discount percentage is 100 and price after is zero, it should yield N/A rather than 0 when computing price before) - minor changes in fragment_discount_calculator, just fooling around with some values
- just fooling around
- ActionBar icon menu items always visible
- pop from FragmentManager's backstack when clicking on the ActionBar's home button in SavedDiscountsFragment
- set transition when opening the SavedDiscountsFragment
- fixed keyboard not hiding upon starting SavedDiscountsFragment
- fixed keyboard not hiding upon starting SavedDiscountsFragment
- fixed keyboard not hiding upon starting SavedDiscountsFragment
- fixed keyboard not hiding upon starting SavedDiscountsFragment
- various changes
- various changes
- initial database access and data modelling draft
- working database access in the scenario of saving discount entries thru DialogFragment prompt
- SavedDiscounts fragment - descending order for listed DiscountItems
- tweaked ActionBar's menu
- display proper ActionBar's title when in SavedDiscountsFragment
- minor menu change
- various layout changes
- various layout changes
- updated localization strings - changed limit of input price
- updated some dimensions - defined screen orientation as portrait only for the main activity
- updated datatype for storing big numbers in DB

- fixed issue with negative zero as a result of substracting discounted price from original price (gonna have to look into this further as I don't fully comprehend the inaccuracies coming from rounding the floating point types in Java)

- fixed issue with negative zero as a result of substracting discounted price from original price (gonna have to look into this further as I don't fully comprehend the inaccuracies stemming from rounding the floating point types in Java)
- various changes regarding the UI
- added delete from DB capability
- deleting items from SavedDiscountsFragment via an ActionMode bar
- small changes here and there :)
- small changes here and there :)
- changes in layouts of the dialog for saving discounts and main fragment
- tweaked user interface (layout and colors) - created dedicated class for constants
- tweaked user interface (layout and colors + added new elements)
- corrected confirmation toast placement (on saving the discount)
- added toast confirmation on item deletion to the list of saved discounts
- extensive user interface tweaks - added application icon
- removed logo from styles (it gets displayed anyway)
- white background for ListView in SavedDiscountsFragment
- renamed sub-package slevnicek to discountor
- added some graphical assets for Android 2.X
- redesigned SavedDiscountsHelper class so that only one single instance ever exists
- added message for an empty ListView in fragment_list_saved_discounts layout - added new styles file for APIs v11-v13 - changed minSDK version to 9
- tweaked styles
- added AboutApplicationDialog - tweaked styles
- tweaked AboutApplicationDialog - set minimumSDKVersion to 9 in build.gradle
- tweaked AboutApplicationDialog
- changed e-mail link in about dialog - changed menus - changed some dimensions and strings
- changed e-mail link in about dialog - changed menus - changed some dimensions and strings
- activated ActionBar spinner in the MainActivity - added new layout for difference calculations mode
- REVERT deactivated ActionBar spinner in the MainActivity
- created separate activity for SavedDiscountsFragment
- added new difference discount calculation mode
- db integration for difference discount calculation mode
- added fragment for counting multipack discounts
- tweaked layout a little bit
- added utility for formatting numbers - tweaked layout a little bit

- new icons and layout tweaks for the TabWidget - replaced application icon with a one boasting proper color - implemented sorting results returned by DB heleper by date of creation (which is a value stored in DB)
- reversed the comparator in getAll method in ModelDiscountItem
MILESTONE 1.1 -final layout tweaks -added necessary drawables to git
MILESTONE 1.12 -fix for keyboard flickering when changing tabs
- created two product flavors: for Google Play and Amazon App Store

- renamed sub-package slevnicek to discountor
- added some graphical assets for Android 2.X
- redesigned SavedDiscountsHelper class so that only one instance ever exists
- redesigned SavedDiscountsHelper class so that only one single instance ever exists
- added message for an empty ListView in fragment_list_saved_discounts layout - added new styles file for APIs v11-v13 - changed minSDK version to 9
- tweaked styles
- added AboutApplicationDialog - tweaked styles
- tweaked AboutApplicationDialog - set minimumSDKVersion to 9 in build.gradle
- tweaked AboutApplicationDialog
- changed e-mail link in about dialog - changed menus - changed some dimensions and strings
- activated ActionBar spinner in the MainActivity - added new layout for difference calculations mode
- REVERT deactivated ActionBar spinner in the MainActivity
- created separate activity for SavedDiscountsFragment
- added new difference discount calculation mode
- db integration for difference discount calculation mode
- added fragment for counting multipack discounts
- tweaked layout a little bit

- new icons and layout tweaks for the TabWidget - replaced application icon with a one boasting proper color - implemented sorting results returned by DB heleper by date of creation (which is a value stored in DB)
- reversed the comparator in getAll method in ModelDiscountItem
MILESTONE 1.1 -final layout tweaks -added necessary drawables to git
MILESTONE 1.12 -fix for keyboard flickering when changing tabs
- created two product flavors: for Google Play and Amazon App Store
